document_data.name: Vesper Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Vesper Way''' was a road in the [[Ravens Bluff/Uptown District|Uptown District]] of the city of [[Ravens Bluff]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4750 Raven's Bluff}}
document_data.Location: Vesper Way stretched from [[Blacktree Boulevard]] in [[Torchtown]] to [[MacIntyre Path]] in [[Sixstar]]. Some referred to this uppermost portion of the road as '''Vesper Way North'''.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/130/City Stories|12}} Between these two roads it was intersected by [[DeVillars Ride]], [[Manycoins Way]], [[Moorland Ride]], and a number of nameless alleys.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Hogs Head Hall]], the guildhall of the [[Fellowship of Herders and Butcher]], stood in the Torchtown portion of Vesper Way on the corner of Manycoins Way.
* [[Rundelstones Manor]], an old decrepit manor that stood at the end of Vesper Way North.
